content: Repository name: github-actions-actions
evidence: README.md contains '# AI Hub - GitHub Actions for AI-Native Development'

content: Mission: 組織全体の開発効率と品質を向上させるためのAIネイティブなGitHub Actionsを提供するハブ
evidence: README states: 'このリポジトリは、GitHub組織全体の開発効率と品質を向上させるための「AIネイティブなGitHub Actions」を提供するハブです。'

content: Total actions provided: 13
evidence: README states: '現在、以下の AI Actions を提供しています（全13件）。'

content: Actions directory structure exists with 15 directories
evidence: ls actions/ shows 15 directories (including _shared and lib)

content: action.yml files: 13 found
evidence: find . -name 'action.yml' found 13 files in actions/ subdirectories

content: Instruction files: 14 found
evidence: ls instructions/ shows 14 .md files

content: Example workflows: 14 found
evidence: ls examples/*.yml shows 14 workflow files

content: Test files: 34 Python test files
evidence: find tests -name '*.py' | wc -l returned 34

content: Test coverage: 97.51%
evidence: TESTING.md states: '- **Coverage**: 97.51%' and '- **Test Count**: 168 tests (13 actions)'

content: Testing approach: Structural/smoke tests only
evidence: TESTING.md states: 'This repository uses a **structural testing approach** for GitHub Actions.'

content: Requirement: Self-hosted runner with Claude Code CLI
evidence: README states: 'これらの Action を利用するには、**Self-hosted Runner** 上で **Claude Code CLI** が実行可能である必要があります。'

content: Core action: review-and-merge exists with composite run type
evidence: action.yml shows 'name: AI Review and Fix' and 'using: composite'

content: Core competency: Claude Code CLI活用、文脈を理解した高度な自動化
evidence: PURPOSE.md states: '特に、**Self-hosted runner上で動作するClaude Code CLI**を活用し、従来の正規表現や静的解析では不可能な、文脈を理解した高度な自動化（レビュー、修正、ドキュメント生成など）を実現する。'

content: Telemetry: Implemented with opt-out capability
evidence: README.md describes telemetry collection with DISABLE_TELEMETRY environment variable

content: Quality metrics: Acceptance rate tracking for review-and-merge
evidence: README states: '**review-and-merge** Action では、AIレビューの品質を測定するための**受入率（Acceptance Rate）**を追跡しています。'

content: Customization capability: Actions support custom rules and templates
evidence: README.md has detailed section on 'カスタムレビュールール' and mentions 'カスタムプロンプトやテンプレートを注入可能'

content: Testing limitation: No functional/runtime testing currently implemented
evidence: TESTING.md states '❌ **Not Tested** (Runtime Behavior): Actual action execution, Real GitHub API interactions, Claude CLI invocation'

content: Future roadmap: Phase 2 integration testing planned with act tool
evidence: TESTING.md Phase 2 section describes integration testing with act for local GitHub Actions execution

content: Actual usage metrics in production environments
evidence: Telemetry is implemented but actual adoption numbers across organizations are not documented
verification_method: Check telemetry backend or survey users

content: Real acceptance rate of AI reviews in production
evidence: Quality metrics tracking is implemented but actual acceptance rate values are not published
